KUROSAWA.ENABLE.NAME: Enable Kurosawa Mode
KUROSAWA.ENABLE.HINT: Enable or disable all module settings.
KUROSAWA.BLACKWHITE.NAME: Enable Black and White Filter
KUROSAWA.BLACKWHITE.HINT: Enable or disable the black and white filter.
KUROSAWA.FILTER3D.NAME: Enable Filter on 3D Dice
KUROSAWA.FILTER3D.HINT: Enable or disable the black and white effect on 3d dice.
KUROSAWA.BRIGHTNESS.NAME: Brightness
KUROSAWA.BRIGHTNESS.HINT: Adjust the brightness of the black and white effect.
KUROSAWA.CONTRAST.NAME: Contrast
KUROSAWA.CONTRAST.HINT: Adjust the contrast of the black and white effect.
KUROSAWA.GRAINENABLE.NAME: Enable Film Grain
KUROSAWA.GRAINENABLE.HINT: Enable or disable the film grain effect.
